definition: powerful individual, family or group/clique/(loanword) valve

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: See publication AV-4, Actuated Thermoplastic Valves, for detailed information.
sentences.chinese: 参阅“执行机构驱动热塑性阀门”，了解详细资料。

sentences.english: The bladder is thin-walled and closed by a one-way valve.
sentences.chinese: 浮囊具有薄壁的结构并且通过单方向的阀门关闭。

sentences.english: Keep valves closed when cylinders are not in service or empty.
sentences.chinese: 当钢瓶没有使用或是空瓶的时候，保持阀门关闭。

sentences.english: This application calls for a much larger Hawse pipe valve.
sentences.chinese: 这个应用就要求更大的锚链管道阀门。

sentences.english: Smaller sizes may be manufactured from equivalent bar stock specifications.
sentences.chinese: 小通径阀门可能采用等价的棒材材料进行制造。

sentences.english: The valves can used for pipe nozzle and have reliable performance.
sentences.chinese: 阀门可用于管端作放空阀用，性能可靠。

sentences.english: Thus, before the property management of residence turned off the valve, my grandmother's house was flooded.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，在物业把总阀门关掉之前，姥姥家发大水了。

sentences.english: It was emphasized by the mechanical structure of the test machine in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文重点对阀门测试机的机械结构部分进行了设计。

sentences.english: Maximums are based on the operating force for each valve size.
sentences.chinese: 这种最大压差值是根据每个通径阀门的操作力计算的。

sentences.english: What kind of valve should be heat or cold insulation, according to the production request.
sentences.chinese: 什么样的阀门应该保温或保冷，要根据生产要求而定。

sentences.english: When returning a cylinder to storage, the valve outlet seal must be installed leak-tight.
sentences.chinese: 当钢瓶返回储存时，必须安装好阀门排气口密封。

sentences.english: Supply and install clarifier sludge outlet sluice valves.
sentences.chinese: 供应及安装净化污泥出路水闸阀门。

sentences.english: These valves will also sustain damage when excessively torqued.
sentences.chinese: 当过分扭转时，这些阀门还是会受到损伤。

sentences.english: The PORV' backup valve is opened to lower the pressure.
sentences.chinese: 减压阀的备用阀门被打开，减少压力。

sentences.english: What is the valve size needed?
Isolate all circuits by closing the zone valves and purge and balancing valves.
sentences.chinese: 通过关闭区域阀门和排气平衡阀来隔离所有循环回路。
